item.title: About
item.description: About These journal entries are to help my future self remember odds and ends. § DIY Gemini by design encourages the client implementation to be done in ~100 LOC.

Gemini, the Middle Child Between Mercury and Apollo Here is the short list of articles that helped us configure: => Gemini server configuration on OpenBSD => Vger Gemini server => OpenBSD and Let’s Encrypt

TLS InsecureSkipVerify => VerifyConnection => TLS Steps => Solderpunk Demo3 => SSL/TLS §1 /Certificates Let’s Encrypt is a tremendous life saver. It eliminated the mystery and wall around certificates.
SSH InsecureIgnoreHostKey => SSH Host Key => TLS Steps => SSH §1 /TOFU Among our tasks was how to mimic the way SSH negotiates the first connection to a remote.
